text:
create an interactive habit management called HabitIQ. it'll let you quickly capture thoughts and have "smart reminders" that adapt to your patterns. **Key features matching your needs:**
* **Quick voice input** (click the mic button and record notes) it then creates a transcript of the voice note in MarkDown
* **Smart reminders** that appear automatically from the notes without you setting them up
* **AI suggestions** that learn from your input patterns
* **Brain-dump friendly** - just type anything and it organizes it
